summary: 1949 is a year in the 20th century.
full_text: 1949  was a common year starting on Saturday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1949th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 949th year of the 2nd millennium, the 49th year of the 20th century, and the 10th and last year of the 1940s decade.
